cs213.photoAlbum.model

Class AlbumFileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.AlbumFileIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AlbumFileIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is responsible for implementing the session persistence of the program, members function are all accessed via model link or package members. Members are package private unless stated otherwise.
    Author:
    Joseph
